title: The Fix — Team Member Info
description: Help us build your profile for the website. Fill out what you can, and use the AI buttons to polish your text!
brandContext: The Fix Aesthetics + Wellness is a medical aesthetics and wellness center with two locations in El Paso, Texas (East and West). We provide professional aesthetic treatments, wellness services, and personalized care in an approachable, welcoming environment. BRAND POSITIONING: We offer high-quality, professional aesthetic treatments without the intimidation factor. We're approachable experts—credentialed professionals who make you feel comfortable, seen, and guided. We're elevated but not exclusive, professional but not pretentious, expert but not intimidating. CORE VALUES: Trusted expertise (credentialed professionals, FDA-approved tech), Personalized care (no cookie-cutter treatments), Approachable environment (warm, welcoming, plain language), People-first philosophy (caring humans, relationships matter), Transparency (upfront pricing, realistic results, no hidden fees). TONE OF VOICE: Conversational and friendly (not clinical), knowledgeable but accessible (no jargon), warm and encouraging (never judgmental), confident and reassuring, honest and transparent, personable—speak like real people, not a corporate entity.
